siteSubTitle: Make your own graph by entering an expression:

expressions.average: aggregate average operation to be used over a range of data
expressions.cases: dataset for the total number of confirmed cases up to the given day
expressions.day: indicates you would like to access data for the current day on the slider
expressions.deaths: dataset for the total number of deaths up to the given day
expressions.first: indicates you would like to access data for the first day in the dataset
expressions.last: indicates you would like to access data for the last day in the dataset
expressions.max: aggregate max operation to be used over a range of data
expressions.min: aggregate min operation to be used over a range of data
expressions.newcases: dataset for the number of new cases on the given day
expressions.newdeaths: dataset for the number of new deaths on the given day
expressions.sum: aggregate sum operation to be used over a range of data
